Author: TotallyNotARadar
Text: It’s abuse IMO if you’re using them for anything other than their intended medical use. Sure, there are varying degrees of abuse (and daily overdoses is *very* bad) but I don’t think you should ignore your use just because others are worse

Author: AntiqueStatus
Text: Yeah I think once a week is already excessive and that's where it starts. Your body gets more dependent on them the longer you do that. I did that for a year and only went when I took them and I was only doing it once or twice a week too.   I only take them once every couple of months when I'm actually constipated.
